edu.xtec.jclic

Interface Constants

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Activity, AuthorSettings, AuthorSingleFrame, Complete, ComplexAssociation, CrossWord, DoublePuzzle, ExchangePuzzle, Explore, ExtendedPlayer, FillInBlanks, HolePuzzle, Identify, Identify, InformationScreen, MemoryGame, Menu, Order, Player, PlayerSettings, SimpleAssociation, SingleInstanceJFrame, TextActivityBase, Utils, WordSearch, WrittenAnswer

    public interface Constants
    Definition of some global constants widely used in JClic.
    Version:
    13.10.02
    Author:
    Francesc Busquets (fbusquets@xtec.cat)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int AC_MARGIN
      Minimal margin between the activity container internal frame and the activity window bounds.
      static int ACTION_AUDIO 
      static int ACTION_HLP 
      static int ACTION_INFO 
      static String[] ACTION_NAME
      Array with the names of all the dynamic actions used in Player objects.
      static int ACTION_NEXT 
      static int ACTION_PREV 
      static int ACTION_REPORTS 
      static int ACTION_RESET 
      static int ACTION_RETURN 
      static int ACTIONS_COUNTER
      Index of the actions counter.
      static String ACTIVITY_OBJECT
      Names used to represent different kinds of objects.
      static String AUDIO_ENABLED
      Key for the boolean parameter 'audioEnabled'.
      static Color BG_COLOR
      Default color used to fill backgrounds of graphic objects.
      static String COMMON_SETTINGS
      Path to the basic JClic settings
      static String COMPRESS_IMAGES
      Key for the boolean parameter compressImages.
      static String COOKIE
      Key for the parameter cookie, used in applets
      static String[] counterNames
      Names used to represent the counters (score, actions and time)
      static String DEFAULT
      String used to represent the default value
      static String DEFAULT_BUNDLE
      Path to the bundle of .properties files with the basic JClic messages
      static RenderingHints DEFAULT_RENDERING_HINTS
      Default rendering hints used with Graphics2D objects.
      static int[] DYNAMIC_ACTIONS
      Array that contains integers representing all the dynamic actions, useful for operations involving the actions member of Player.
      static String ENABLED
      String used to represent the enabled value
      static String EXIT_URL
      Key for the parameter exitUrl, used in applets to specify the URL where the browser should navigate when JClic executes an exit command.
      static String EXTERNAL_OBJECT
      Names used to represent different kinds of objects.
      static String FALSE
      String used to represent the boolean value false.
      static int HAND_CURSOR
      Index of the hand (standard) cursor in the Player member cursors.
      static String ID
      String used to represent the id value
      static String INFO_URL_FRAME
      Key for the parameter infoUrlFrame, used in applets to specify the name of the browser frame or window where the info content of the activities will be displayed.
      static String JMF
      String used to represent the Java Media Framework system
      static String LOGO_ICON
      Path to the JClic logo
      static String MEDIA_OBJECT
      Names used to represent different kinds of objects.
      static String MEDIA_SYSTEM
      Key for the runtime property mediaSystem.
      static String[] MEDIA_SYSTEMS
      Array of strings containing the values of all the valid multimedia extensions
      static int MIN_CELL_SIZE
      Minimal value for both with and height of cells.
      static String MYURL
      Key for the boolean parameter 'myurl'.
      static String NAV_BUTTONS_ALWAYS
      Key for the boolean parameter 'navButtonsAlways'.
      static String NO_MEDIASYSTEM_WARN
      Key for the parameter or runtime property 'noMediaSystemWarn', used to indicate that users should not be warned about the absence of multimedia extensions in their Java system.
      static int NUM_ACTIONS 
      static int NUM_COUNTERS
      Number of counters used in JClic players (currently 3: score, actions and time)
      static int OK_CURSOR
      Index of the ok cursor in the Player member cursors.
      static String PRE_DRAW_IMAGES
      Key for the boolean parameter 'preDrawImages', used in past versions to activate a workaround to a Java graphics bug.
      static String PROGRAM
      Name of the application (JClic)
      static String PROJECT_OBJECT
      Names used to represent different kinds of objects.
      static String QT
      String used to represent the QuickTime for Java (pre-6.1) multimedia system
      static String QT61
      String used to represent the QuickTime for Java (6.1 or later) multimedia system
      static int REC_CURSOR
      Index of the record (microphone) cursor in the Player member cursors.
      static String REPORTER_CLASS
      Key for the parameter 'reporterClass', used to specify the type of Reporter to be used.
      static String REPORTER_PARAMS
      Key for the parameter 'reporterParams', used to pass specific parametres to the reporter.
      static int SCORE_COUNTER
      Index of the score counter.
      static String SEQUENCE_OBJECT
      Names used to represent different kinds of objects.
      static String SKIN
      Key for the parameter 'skin', used to specify the Skin to be used.
      static String SKIN_OBJECT
      Names used to represent different kinds of objects.
      static String SYSTEM_SOUNDS
      Key for the boolean parameter 'systemSounds'.

      Bit masks used to represent different types of resources.

      Bit masks used to represent different types of resources.

      Index of the time counter.

      Key for the boolean parameter 'trace'.
      static String TRUE
      String used to represent the boolean value true.
      static String URL_BASE
      Key for the parameter urlBase, used in applets to specify the absolute base URL used to locate other files.

      Names used to represent different kinds of objects.

      • DEFAULT_BUNDLE

        static final String DEFAULT_BUNDLE
        Path to the bundle of .properties files with the basic JClic messages
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • COMMON_SETTINGS

        static final String COMMON_SETTINGS
        Path to the basic JClic settings
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LOGO_ICON

        static final String LOGO_ICON
        Path to the JClic logo
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROGRAM

        static final String PROGRAM
        Name of the application (JClic)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • COOKIE

        static final String COOKIE
        Key for the parameter cookie, used in applets
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXIT_URL

        static final String EXIT_URL
        Key for the parameter exitUrl, used in applets to specify the URL where the browser should navigate when JClic executes an exit command.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • URL_BASE

        static final String URL_BASE
        Key for the parameter urlBase, used in applets to specify the absolute base URL used to locate other files.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INFO_URL_FRAME

        static final String INFO_URL_FRAME
        Key for the parameter infoUrlFrame, used in applets to specify the name of the browser frame or window where the info content of the activities will be displayed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • COMPRESS_IMAGES

        static final String COMPRESS_IMAGES
        Key for the boolean parameter compressImages. When false, images larger than the cell will be cropped. Otherwise, JClic will compress it to fit into the cell.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PRE_DRAW_IMAGES

        static final String PRE_DRAW_IMAGES
        Key for the boolean parameter 'preDrawImages', used in past versions to activate a workaround to a Java graphics bug.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SKIN

        static final String SKIN
        Key for the parameter 'skin', used to specify the Skin to be used.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REPORTER_CLASS

        static final String REPORTER_CLASS
        Key for the parameter 'reporterClass', used to specify the type of Reporter to be used.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REPORTER_PARAMS

        static final String REPORTER_PARAMS
        Key for the parameter 'reporterParams', used to pass specific parametres to the reporter.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SYSTEM_SOUNDS

        static final String SYSTEM_SOUNDS
        Key for the boolean parameter 'systemSounds'. When false, no system sounds are played.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • AUDIO_ENABLED

        static final String AUDIO_ENABLED
        Key for the boolean parameter 'audioEnabled'. When false, no sounds or other media are played.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NAV_BUTTONS_ALWAYS

        static final String NAV_BUTTONS_ALWAYS
        Key for the boolean parameter 'navButtonsAlways'. When true, the navigation buttons (next activity and previous activity) are always displayed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TRACE

        static final String TRACE
        Key for the boolean parameter 'trace'. When true, debug messages are displayed in the console.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MYURL

        static final String MYURL
        Key for the boolean parameter 'myurl'. Used by applets to know its DocumentBase since Oracle has broken this funcionality for local filesystems in Java 1.7.40.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TRUE

        static final String TRUE
        String used to represent the boolean value true.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FALSE

        static final String FALSE
        String used to represent the boolean value false.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT

        static final String DEFAULT
        String used to represent the default value
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ENABLED

        static final String ENABLED
        String used to represent the enabled value
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ID

        static final String ID
        String used to represent the id value
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • QT

        static final String QT
        String used to represent the QuickTime for Java (pre-6.1) multimedia system
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • QT61

        static final String QT61
        String used to represent the QuickTime for Java (6.1 or later) multimedia system
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • JMF

        static final String JMF
        String used to represent the Java Media Framework system
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MEDIA_SYSTEM

        static final String MEDIA_SYSTEM
        Key for the runtime property mediaSystem. Possible values are JMF, QT, QT61 or null.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NO_MEDIASYSTEM_WARN

        static final String NO_MEDIASYSTEM_WARN
        Key for the parameter or runtime property 'noMediaSystemWarn', used to indicate that users should not be warned about the absence of multimedia extensions in their Java system.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MEDIA_SYSTEMS

        static final String[] MEDIA_SYSTEMS
        Array of strings containing the values of all the valid multimedia extensions

      • DEFAULT_RENDERING_HINTS

        static final RenderingHints DEFAULT_RENDERING_HINTS
        Default rendering hints used with Graphics2D objects.

        static final int HAND_CURSOR
        Index of the hand (standard) cursor in the Player member cursors.
